analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesika

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa
